name: dependencies
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: good first issue
description: Issues that are suitable for newcomers

name: hacktoberfest-accepted
description: Pull requests that are accepted as part of DigitalOcean's Hacktoberfest

name: priority: critical
description: Issues and/or pull requests that should be resolved/merged as soon as possible

name: priority: high
description: Issues and/or pull requests that should be resolved/merged within the next 3 months

name: priority: medium
description: Issues and/or pull requests that should be resolved/merged within the next 6 months

name: priority: low
description: Issues and/or pull requests that should be resolved/merged within the next 1 year

name: priority: trivial
description: Issues and/or pull requests that should be resolved/merged when time permits

name: status: approved
description: Issues and/or pull requests that have been approved to be worked on, or to be merged soon

name: status: blocked
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are blocked by another issue and/or pull request

name: status: do not merge
description: Pull requests that should not be merged at the current state

name: status: duplicate
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are duplicates of another issue and/or pull request

name: status: help wanted
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are in need of help

name: status: invalid
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are invalid/spam

name: status: needs info
description: Issues and/or pull requests that need more information before it can proceed

name: status: on hold
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are put on hold until a later date

name: status: review needed
description: Pull requests that are pending review by maintainers

name: status: stale
description: Pull requests that do not have any activity in the last 30 days

name: status: triage needed
description: Issues that are pending triage and confirmation by maintainers

name: status: under investigation
description: Issues that are currently under investigation by maintainers

name: status: wontfix
description: Issues that have been rejected by the maintainers

name: status: work in progress
description: Issues and/or pull requests that are currently a work in progress by someone

name: type: chore
description: Issues that don't affect the codebase but are necessary to keep the project running

name: type: docs
description: Issues that are related to the documentation

name: type: feature request
description: Issues that propose a new feature to be included in the software

name: type: maintenance
description: Issues that are related to the maintenance of the project

name: type: testing
description: Issues that are related to the test suite
